Major Wins in 2024

Member Benefits

Building Bridges, Not Walls

Communication

Monthly interactions with Crumbl's CEO and quarterly face-to-face sessions ensure your voice is heard.

24/7 Peer Support

Exclusive Slack community focused on operations, marketing, equipment troubleshooting, and peer support.

Legal Protection

Annual legal consultation, group legal fund access, and expert guidance on franchise law to protect you.

Cost Savings

Negotiated supplier pricing, group health insurance, and operational efficiencies that benefit all.

Business Intelligence

Best practices sharing, P&L optimization strategies, and proven solutions from successful operators.

Proven Track Record

From protecting Sunday access to securing better DoorDash terms, we deliver real results that FPs.

Building Bridges, Not Walls

Recent CFPA Wins for All Franchise Partners

✓ Protected Core Product
Stopped "Crumbl goes mini" week that would have removed our signature large cookies
✓ Sunday Store Access
Restored franchise partners' rights to enter stores on Sundays
✓ DoorDash Full Refunds
Secured full-value refunds when loyalty points are redeemed
✓ Better Supplier Pricing
Negotiated improved rates with Quick Supply/CNA
✓ Chemical Program Options
More supplier choices to reduce costs
✓ Uniform Update Delayed
Pushed to June 2026 to ease financial pressure

Ready to Join Us?

The CFPA is your partner in success. Together, we're building a stronger, more profitable future for every Crumbl franchise partner.

What our members say

The franchise association has been invaluable to me as a franchise owner... Joining the association gave me a voice and assurance that I was not alone. The problem solving, equipment fixes and tips/tricks have been invaluable... The CFPA audience has helped me in so many ways...

I feel so strongly that Crumbl owners need a community of other owners where we can share ideas and best practices... We need a place where we can combine our voice and speak in a united way to Crumbl HQ... it will improve the entire brand.

One reason we joined the association is so we can have excellent legal counsel that will help us understand all legal aspects of the decisions corporate has made... We also need our own legal counsel since we aren't experts in franchise law either.

Before I joined the association, I was alone. Crumbl corporate does not make franchise owners feel valued... Now I am able to communicate across the country and learn that I am not alone.

Membership in the CFPA has proven valuable for reasons like a community of like-minded franchise partners who strive for excellence... Knowing the board communicates regularly with the executives at Corporate in a thoughtful and professional way adds credibility to our voices...
